language.entry: More stagecoaches are coming to town. A larger selection of heroes will be available to recruit. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Level: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Additional hero barracks have been added! The roster size is increased. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Level: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Level 5 heroes can now appear in the Stage Coach.
Davantage de diligences arrivent en ville. Un plus grand choix de héros sera disponible pour le recrutement. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Niveau : {?level}%d{colour_end}
De nouveaux quartiers sont disponibles pour les héros ! La taille de la liste de recrues a augmentée. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Niveau : {?level}%d{colour_end}
Des héros de niveau 5 peuvent maintenant apparaître dans la diligence
Es kommen mehr Kutschen ins Dorf und bringen eine größere Auswahl an Helden, die du anheuern kannst. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Stufe: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Weitere Heldenunterkünfte wurden hinzufügt! Die Heldenliste wurde erweitert. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Stufe: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Helden der ersten Stufe können nun beim Kutscher erscheinen.
Un gran número de diligencias se dirigen a la ciudad, por lo que habrá más héroes disponibles para reclutar. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Nivel: {?level}%d{colour_end}
¡Se han añadido más barracones de héroes! Aumenta la capacidad de la formación. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Nivel: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Ahora en la diligencia pueden llegar héroes de nivel 5
Mais carruagens estão chegando à cidade. Uma seleção maior de heróis estará disponível para recrutar. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Nível: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Foram adicionados mais quartéis de heróis! O tamanho da equipe foi aumentado. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Nível: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Heróis de nível 5 podem agora aparecer na Carruagem
Дилижансы стали чаще заезжать в деревню. Теперь для найма доступно больше героев! {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Уровень: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Расширены казармы для героев! Увеличена максимальная численность команды. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Уровень: {?level}%d{colour_end}
С дилижансом могут прибыть герои первого уровня.
Nadjeżdżają kolejne dyliżansy. Wkrótce pojawią się nowi bohaterowie do werbunku. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Poziom: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Wzniesiono dodatkowe koszary! Skład drużyny zwiększył się. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Poziom: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Bohaterowie 5 poziomu mogą teraz pojawić się w Dyliżansie.
Do města přijíždějí další dostavníky. Zajistí širší výběr hrdinů k rekrutování. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Úroveň: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Byla přidána další kasárna hrdinů! Došlo k rozšíření soupisky. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Úroveň: {?level}%d{colour_end}
V dostavníku se mohou objevit hrdinové na úrovni 5.
Sono in arrivo più diligenze al villaggio. Una più ampia selezione di eroi sarà disponibile per il reclutamento. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Livello: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Nuove caserme per gli eroi sono state aggiunte! Le dimensioni dei ranghi sono aumentate. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Livello: {?level}%d{colour_end}
Eroi di Livello 5 possono ora apparire nella Diligenza.
更多的马车将来到小镇。更多的英雄将可供招募。{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}等级：{?level}%d{colour_end}
更多的英雄营房已经添加！英雄名册现在更长了。{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}Level：{?level}%d{colour_end}
驿站马车现在会出现5级英雄。
더 많은 역마차가 마을로 들어옵니다. 다양한 영웅들을 고용할 수 있게 됩니다. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}레벨: {?level}%d{colour_end}
영웅 막사가 추가되었습니다! 로스터 규모가 증가했습니다. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}레벨: {?level}%d{colour_end}
레벨 5 영웅이 역마차에 등장합니다.
더 많은 역마차가 마을로 오고 있습니다. 이제 한 번에 고용할 수 있는 영웅이 더 늘어났습니다.{colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}레벨: {?level}%d{colour_end}
영웅 막사가 추가되었습니다! 명단의 규모가 증가했습니다. {colour_start|town_activity_log_positive_result}레벨: {?level}%d{colour_end}
역마차에서 5레벨 영웅이 출현합니다.
